TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Button extends System.Windows.Forms.Button

summary.span: 表示可添加到 Microsoft Office Excel 工作表的 Windows 窗体按钮。

span.span: Represents a Windows Forms button that can be added to a Microsoft Office Excel worksheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同于。The is different from a . 具有其他成员，使其能够添加到 Excel 工作表并，为其提供的其他方法和属性。The has additional members that enable it to be added to an Excel worksheet and that give it additional methods and properties. 不要使用`New`构造函数创建一个新。Do not use the `New` constructor to create a new . 使用方法将添加一个新到工作表。Use the method to add a new to a worksheet.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加控件与工作表，并使用属性以绿色的颜色单元格的边框。The following code example adds a control to a worksheet and uses the property to color the border of the cell green. 按钮的事件处理程序使用属性来隐藏按钮，然后会提示用户选择要显示该按钮，或允许其保持隐藏状态。The event handler of the button uses the property to hide the button, and then prompts the user to choose to either unhide the button, or allow it to remain hidden. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. span.span: The distance, in points, between the bottom edge of the and the top edge of the worksheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值等于的总和属性值和属性值。The value of this property is equal to the sum of the property value and the property value. 属性使用点，而属性使用像素值。The property uses points, whereas the property uses pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加单元格 B2 的当前工作表上的控件。The following code example adds a control over cell B2 of the current worksheet. 按钮的事件处理程序显示的当前值和按钮的属性。The event handler of the button displays the current values of the and properties of the button. 当列 B 或第 2 行的大小调整在运行时，这些值将更改根据列或行的新大小。When column B or row 2 is resized at run time, these values change according to the new size of the column or row. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的单元格依赖于单元格的数目，该控件重叠和的设置属性。The cell returned depends on how many cells the control overlaps and the setting of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用并属性来获取在左上角和右下右角的单元格控件。The following code example uses the and properties to get the top left and bottom right cells in relation to a control. 事件处理程序按钮的颜色的右上角和右下角单元格边框红色。The event handler of the button colors the borders of the top left and bottom right cell red. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 将 置于 Z 顺序的顶层。

span.span: Brings the to the front of the z-order.

returns.span: 此方法将返回一个空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）；否则，此方法将返回 。

span.span: This method returns a null reference ( in Visual Basic); otherwise this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法设置的 z 顺序到中的最后一个索引集合; 编号的 z 顺序是相反的中的索引编号集合。This method sets the z-order of the to the last index in the collection; the numbering of the z-order is the opposite of the numbering of the index in the collection. 更高版本中的索引集合、 z 顺序的较小。The higher the index in the collection, the lower the z-order of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用并方法设置为 3 的 z 顺序工作表上的控件。The following code example uses the and methods to set the z-order of three controls on a worksheet. 如果单击的按钮当前在 z 顺序的前面，则按钮通过调用移动到集合的底层。If the button currently at the front of the z-order is clicked, then the button is moved to the back of the collection by calling . 否则，该按钮移动到集合的顶层通过调用。Otherwise, the button is moved to the front of the collection by calling . 请注意，z 顺序的三个按钮的初始范围从 2 到 4。Note that the z-order of the three buttons initially range from 2 to 4. 工作表上的运行时存储控件最初具有 1 的 z 顺序位置。The Runtime Storage Control on the worksheet initially has the z-order position of 1. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了将自身复制到剪贴板中，当用户单击它时的控件。The following code example demonstrates a control that copies itself to the Clipboard when the user clicks it. 事件处理程序按钮调用方法复制到剪贴板作为位图按钮。The event handler of the button calls the method to copy the button to the Clipboard as a bitmap. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为创建在 Microsoft Office Excel，此属性返回字符串 XCEL，这与十六进制数 5843454c。Because the was created in Microsoft Office Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加到当前工作表的控件。The following code example adds a control to the current worksheet. 事件处理程序，此按钮显示的值和属性。The event handler for this button displays the values of the and properties. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只应该用于，在运行时以编程方式创建。This method should only be used with a that is created programmatically at run time. 如果在调用此方法引发异常在设计时添加到工作表。An exception is thrown if you call this method on a that is added to the worksheet at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了将自身删除，当用户单击它时的控件。The following code example demonstrates a control that deletes itself when the user clicks it. 事件处理程序按钮调用方法来删除的按钮。The event handler of the button calls the method to delete the button. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 获取或设置 的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the .

value.span: 的高度（以磅为单位）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对所做更改并属性值将导致属性值为更改。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the to change. 属性使用点，而属性使用像素值。The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例进行比较的大小调整和重新定位的两个行为向工作表中的控件。The following code example compares the resizing and relocating behavior of two controls to a worksheet. 的第一个按钮的事件处理程序调整和按钮的属性，以便按钮更改大小，但仍保留在工作表上的同一位置。The event handler of the first button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes size, but remains in the same location on the worksheet. 的第二个按钮的事件处理程序调整和按钮的属性，以便按钮更改在工作表上的位置，但保留在相同的大小。The event handler of the second button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes location on the worksheet, but stays in the same size. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件添加到 Microsoft Office Excel 工作表的索引值的索引，因为它开始 2工作表的集合。The index value of controls added to the Microsoft Office Excel worksheet starts at 2 because it is the index of the collection of the sheet. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加三个向工作表中的控件。The following code example adds three controls to a worksheet. 这些按钮共享事件处理程序使用属性来显示被单击的按钮的索引。These buttons share a event handler that uses the property to display the index of the button that was clicked. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用点，而属性使用像素值。The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. 将值设置为负数或大于 12288 数字不会引发异常，但会导致控件设置为介于 0 和 12288 之间。Setting the value to a negative number or a number higher than 12288 does not throw an exception but results in the control being set between 0 and 12288. ## Examples 下面的代码示例进行比较的大小调整和重新定位的两个行为向工作表中的控件。The following code example compares the resizing and relocating behavior of two controls to a worksheet. 的第一个按钮的事件处理程序调整和按钮的属性，以便按钮更改大小，但仍保留在工作表上的同一位置。The event handler of the first button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes size, but remains in the same location on the worksheet. 的第二个按钮的事件处理程序调整和按钮的属性，以便按钮更改在工作表上的位置，但保留在相同的大小。The event handler of the second button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes location on the worksheet, but stays in the same size. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当工作表受保护时，在设计时能否修改 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the can be modified at design time when the sheet is protected.

value.span: 如果当工作表受保护时不能在设计时修改 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cannot be modified at design time when the sheet is protected; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个仅可以在工作表受保护时锁定。A can only be locked when the sheet is protected. 锁定不能移动或调整其大小在设计时。A locked cannot be moved or resized at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加两个控件添加到当前工作表，并设置的其中一个为按钮的属性`true`。The following code example adds two controls to the current worksheet and sets the property of one of the buttons to `true`. 该示例然后保护工作表，并使用方法放到设计模式下的 Microsoft Office Excel。The example then protects the worksheet and uses the method to place Microsoft Office Excel into design mode. 此时，未锁定按钮可以移动并调整大小时，但不能移动或调整大小的锁定按钮。At this point, the unlocked button can be moved and resized, but the locked button cannot be moved or resized. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加两个具有不同的运行时行为向工作表中的控件。The following code example adds two controls that have different run-time behavior to a worksheet. 第一个按钮涵盖范围的单元格 B2 到 C3。The first button covers the range of cells B2 through C3. 在运行时在用户调整列或在此范围内的行，第一个按钮将调整大小以适应所做的更改。When the user resizes a column or row in this range at run time, the first button will resize to adjust to the changes. 第二个按钮涵盖范围的单元格 B5 到 C6，并此按钮的属性设置为。The second button covers the range of cells B5 through C6, and the property of this button is set to . 在运行时在用户调整列或在此范围内的行，第二个按钮不会更改大小。When the user resizes a column or row in this range at run time, the second button will not change size. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性等于的总和属性值和属性值。The value of the property is equal to the sum of the property value and the property value. 属性使用点，而属性使用像素值。The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. 将值设置为负数或大于 12288 数字不会引发异常，但会导致控件设置为介于 0 和 12288 之间。Setting the value to a negative number or a number higher than 12288 does not throw an exception but results in the control being set between 0 and 12288. ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加单元格 B2 上的控件。The following code example adds a control on cell B2. 按钮的事件处理程序显示的当前值和按钮的属性。The event handler of the button displays the current values of the and properties of the button. 当列 B 或第 2 行的大小调整在运行时，这些值将更改根据列或行的新大小。When column B or row 2 is resized at run time, these values change according to the new size of the column or row. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加两个控件添加到工作表，然后通过以编程方式选择这两个按钮方法。The following code example adds two controls to a worksheet and then programmatically selects both of the buttons by using the method. 首次调用传入`true`的值的`Replace`参数以确保第一个按钮在工作表上的唯一选择。The first call to passes in `true` for the value of the `Replace` parameter to make sure that the first button is the only selection on the worksheet. 第二次调用传入`false`，以便在第二个按钮选择除第一个按钮。The second call to passes in `false` so that the second button is selected in addition to the first button. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法设置的 z 顺序到中的第一个索引集合; 编号的 z 顺序是相反的中的索引编号集合。This method sets the z-order of the to the first index in the collection; the numbering of the z-order is the opposite of the numbering of the index in the collection. 更高版本中的索引集合、 z 顺序的较小。The higher the index in the collection, the lower the z-order of the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用并方法设置为 3 的 z 顺序工作表上的控件。The following code example uses the and methods to set the z-order of three controls on a worksheet. 如果单击的按钮当前在 z 顺序的前面，则按钮通过调用移动到集合的底层。If the button currently at the front of the z-order is clicked, then the button is moved to the back of the collection by calling . 否则，该按钮移动到集合的顶层通过调用。Otherwise, the button is moved to the front of the collection by calling . 请注意，z 顺序的三个按钮的初始范围从 2 到 4。Note that the z-order of the three buttons initially range from 2 to 4. 工作表上的运行时存储控件最初具有 1 的 z 顺序位置。The Runtime Storage Control on the worksheet initially has the z-order position of 1. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例添加到当前工作表的控件。The following code example adds a control to the current worksheet. 此按钮的事件处理程序使用属性来获取按钮，然后会增加此宽度10 点。The event handler for this button uses the property to get a for the button, and then increases the width of this by 10 points. 虽然事件处理程序仅调整按钮的宽度，高度还自动更改，以便该控件将保留原始比例。Although the event handler only adjusts the width of the button, the height also changes automatically so that the control retains the original proportion. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使用点，而属性使用像素值。The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例进行比较的大小调整和重新定位的两个行为向工作表中的控件。The following code example compares the resizing and relocating behavior of two controls to a worksheet. 的第一个按钮的事件处理程序调整和按钮的属性，以便按钮更改大小，但仍保留在工作表上的同一位置。The event handler of the first button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes size, but remains in the same location on the worksheet. 的第二个按钮的事件处理程序调整和按钮的属性，以便按钮更改在工作表上的位置，但仍保持相同的大小。The event handler of the second button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes location on the worksheet, but stays the same size. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加控件与工作表，并使用属性以绿色的颜色单元格的边框。The following code example adds a control to a worksheet and uses the property to color the border of the cell green. 按钮的事件处理程序使用属性来隐藏按钮，然后会提示用户选择要显示该按钮，或允许其保持隐藏状态。The event handler of the button uses the property to hide the button, and then prompts the user to choose to either unhide the button, or allow it to remain hidden. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 对所做更改和 left 的属性值将导致属性值为更改。Changes made to the and left property values cause the property value of the to change. 属性使用点，而属性使用像素值。The property uses points, whereas property uses pixels. 将值设置为负数或大于 12288 数字不会引发异常，但会导致控件设置为介于 1 和 12288 之间。Setting the value to a negative number or a number higher than 12288 does not throw an exception but results in the control being set between 1 and 12288. ## Examples 下面的代码示例进行比较的大小调整和重新定位的两个行为向工作表中的控件。The following code example compares the resizing and relocating behavior of two controls to a worksheet. 的第一个按钮的事件处理程序调整和按钮的属性，以便按钮更改大小，但仍保留在工作表上的同一位置。The event handler of the first button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes size, but remains in the same location on the worksheet. 的第二个按钮的事件处理程序调整和按钮的属性，以便按钮更改在工作表上的位置，但仍保持相同的大小。The event handler of the second button adjusts the and properties of the button so that the button changes location on the worksheet, but stays the same size. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取 的 Z 顺序位置。

span.span: Gets the z-order position of the .

value.span: 的 Z 顺序位置。

span.span: The z-order position of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Z 顺序由集合。The z-order is determined by the collection. 对象的任何集合，在 z 顺序的底层对象是*集合*(1)，并在 z 顺序的顶层对象是*集合*(*集合*。`Count`)。In any collection of objects, the object at the back of the z-order is *collection*(1), and the object at the front of the z-order is *collection*(*collection*.`Count`). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性设置为 3 的 z 顺序工作表上的控件。The following code example uses the property to set the z-order of three controls on a worksheet. 如果单击按钮当前在 z 顺序的前面时，按钮将移动到集合的底层。If the button currently at the front of the z-order is clicked, then the button is moved to the back of the collection. 否则，该按钮移到集合的顶层。Otherwise, the button is moved to the front of the collection. 请注意，z 顺序的三个按钮的初始范围从 2 到 4。Note that the z-order of the three buttons initially range from 2 to 4. 工作表上的运行时存储控件最初具有 1 的 z 顺序位置。The Runtime Storage Control on the worksheet initially has the z-order position of 1. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/CS/Sheet1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelWindowsFormsControls/VB/Sheet1.vb#1)]
